StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerProjectedGradDateHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int AS
SELECT H.OFFICER_PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE_HISTORY_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(11), H.PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE, 106) AS PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE, CONVERT(CHAR(11), H.PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE_CHANGED_DATE, 106) AS PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE_CHANGED_DATE FROM OFFICER_PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE_HISTORY H WHERE H.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID ORDER BY H.PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE_CHANGED_DATE DESC, H.OFFICER_PROJECTED_GRAD_DATE_HISTORY_ID DESC
